title: Becoming a Data Scientist Podcast Episode 11: Stephanie Rivera
dc:creator: Renee
description: Stephanie Rivera has worked in machine learning and data science for academic research (at University of Tennessee), for the government (Department of Defense), for a large consulting firm (Booz Allen), and now for a startup (MyStrength). In the interview, she discusses her career path, her experiences with mentorship, and her role in authoring The Field Guide to Data Science and the Explore Data Science online course. Podcast Audio Links: Link to podcast Episode 11 audio Podcast's RSS feed for podcast subscription apps Podcast on Stitcher Podcast on iTunes Podcast Video Playlist: Youtube playlist of interview videos
content:encoded:
Stephanie Rivera has worked in machine learning and data science for academic research (at University of Tennessee), for the government (Department of Defense), for a large consulting firm (Booz Allen), and now for a startup (MyStrength). In the interview, she discusses her career path, her experiences with mentorship, and her role in authoring The Field Guide to Data Science and the Explore Data Science online course.
